meanings.definition: Of or relating to sea anemones
meanings.sent1: The actinian creatures swayed gently in the ocean currents.
meanings.sent2: The actinian habitat provides shelter for various marine species.
meanings.sent3: The actinian party in the underwater world was the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were as graceful as an actinian in the sea.
meanings.sent5: The actinian colors painted a beautiful picture in the coral reef.

meanings.sent1: The actinian waved its tentacles in search of food.
meanings.sent2: We observed an actinian clinging to a rock in the tide pool.
meanings.sent3: The actinian seemed to be dancing to the rhythm of the waves.
meanings.sent4: The actinian's delicate beauty captivated the young marine biologist.
meanings.sent5: Children were fascinated by the actinian's graceful movements in the water.
